name: Awkward Media
tagline: A Digital Marketing firm, with a strange name
description:
Established in 2008 Awkward Media has helped small to medium sized businesses grow their revenue through our digital marketing and branding efforts. We make sure to work closely with our clients to fully understand their brand, business, industry and competitors to create tailored solutions to their unique problems. 
 
Our services include:
- SEO
- PPC 
- CONTENT MARKETING
- BRANDING
- WEB DESIGN
